original_title: Animals in the Wild: Monkeys and Mammals
overview: An unforgettable journey into the animal kingdom, Animals in the Wild is both a series of discovery and an exploration of natural history. Animals in the Wild provides an insight into the daily life, survival methods, mating rituals and eating & feeding habits of the most celebrated animal species on earth. Through extensive research, archival documents and breathtaking visuals, the majesty of nature's hidden kingdom is presented.
title: Animals in the Wild: Monkeys and Mammals
